home.passionStatement: Driven by a passion for technology and the art of coding, I create applications that blend functionality with thoughtful design.
home.listkeeperDescription: A beautifully simple list app that focuses on what matters
home.pixelfarmDescription: Roguelike farming adventure with charming pixel art

listkeeper.subtitle: Simple lists. Done right.
listkeeper.description: In a world of bloated productivity apps that try to do everything, ListKeeper takes a different approach. It's a beautifully simple list management app that does one thing exceptionally well: helping you organize your thoughts and tasks without the noise. No complex features you'll never use, no overwhelming interfaces—just elegant, focused list-making that stays out of your way.

pixelfarm.subtitle: Coming soon...
pixelfarm.description: An upcoming roguelike farming adventure that blends charming pixel art with deep, engaging gameplay. While we're keeping the details under wraps for now, we can promise months of captivating gameplay in a completely ad-free experience. Built with passion and designed for those who appreciate both strategy and style.
